Html:
Dear all,

I would like to ask whether BibWord can add yearsuffix automatically. For example, if I have two references, xxx et al., 2012a and xxx et al., 2012b, how to let word 2007 show "a" and "b" after 2012 automatically with BibWord?

Thanks in advance.

Ye Gao

Yes. But it requires the use of the Extender program (http://bibword.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=BibWord%20Extender&referringTitle=Documentation)

Most Harvard-related styles on this site use year suffices if you are looking for examples.
